create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, room_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, room_class_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (room_class_id) REFERENCES room_class(id));
update: UPDATE room SET room_number = %s, room_class_id = %s WHERE id = %s;
find_id: SELECT id FROM room WHERE room_number = %s;
fetch_all: SELECT r.id, r.room_number, rc.class_name, rc.seats FROM room r JOIN room_class rc ON r.room_class_id = rc.id;
